objects.text: 925 Sterling Silver • Pink Drop Design • Gift for Her
With Certificate of Authenticity & 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner features a luxurious and feminine design, ideal for promoting rose gold jewelry. The background is a softly blended radial gradient transitioning from pale blush to muted rose, accented with fine circular strokes and subtle ornamentation to create elegance and depth. At the top, a prominent text element (`heading`) announces the product in a classic serif font. Below it, a secondary serif text layer (`subheading`) provides a poetic description of the jewelry. 

The centerpiece consists of a high-resolution image (`product_image`) of rose gold and diamond-patterned ear studs. A horizontal line of features (`features`) highlights material and gifting suitability. The price (`price`) is showcased boldly underneath, and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_button_background` & `cta`) invites the user to shop. Finally, a smaller serif note (`warranty_text`) offers assurance regarding authenticity and warranty at the base.

**Color Palette:**
- Blush Pink: `#F8D7DA`
- Rose Pink: `#E5A4A4`
- Deep Mauve: `#5C2536`
- Soft Burgundy: `#78333F`
- Rose Gold Accent: `#D88E9D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features earrings with a soft, elegant color palette primarily composed of rose gold (#F4A9A2), clear diamond white (#FFFFFF), and subtle glints of crystal silver (#E0E0E0). The rose gold base forms a gentle frame, adding warmth and luxury, while the white gemstones reflect brilliance and purity, drawing the eye. The silver hues subtly blend between the rose and white elements, enhancing shine and elegance. This harmonious blend of colors gives the product both delicacy and sparkle. For an advertisement banner, a soft blush background (#FAE5E3) with rose gold and diamond highlights would beautifully complement and showcase the product.
